original: Methunaṁ dhammaṁ paṭisevantassa āpattiyo catunnaṁ adhikaraṇānaṁ katamaṁ adhikaraṇaṁ?
analyzed: methunam dhammam paṭisevantassa āpattiyaḥ catunnam adhikaraṇānam katamam

original: Methunaṁ dhammaṁ paṭisevantassa āpattiyo catunnaṁ adhikaraṇānaṁ āpattādhikaraṇaṁ …pe….
analyzed: methunam dhammam paṭisevantassa āpattiyaḥ catunnam adhikaraṇānaṃ āpattādhikaraṇam pe

original: Anādariyaṁ paṭicca udake uccāraṁ vā passāvaṁ vā kheḷaṁ vā karontassa āpatti catunnaṁ adhikaraṇānaṁ katamaṁ adhikaraṇaṁ?
analyzed: anādariyam paṭicca udake uccāram vā passāvam vā kheḷam vā karontassa āpatti catunnam adhikaraṇānam katamam adhikaraṇa

original: Anādariyaṁ paṭicca udake uccāraṁ vā passāvaṁ vā kheḷaṁ vā karontassa āpatti catunnaṁ adhikaraṇānaṁ āpattādhikaraṇaṁ.
analyzed: anādariyam paṭicca udake uccāram vā passāvam vā kheḷam vā karontassa āpatti catunnam adhikaraṇānam āpattādhikaraṇa
